grow() - Method in class tree.Leaf
 
grow() - Method in class tree.Tree
Recursively grows the tree until one of those conditions is met: samples cannot be separated all samples are correctly classified maximal depth is reached. In addition, the internal importance is updated in inImp object (see constructor).
grow() - Method in interface tree.TreeIF
Grow the tree from a set of learning samples from at least two classes.
